data.fullContent: GreenTech has revealed its success with two of its services, GreenTech Music and Top Video, in its 2017 report. GreenTech Music service is now available in more than 200 countries around the world and has a library of more than 40 million songs. GreenTech Music Playlists and Top Stations have now been used more than 300 billion times. Top Video has also had its biggest year of growth ever. Top Video usage more than doubled year-over-year around the world. It now has 100 million monthly subscribers which is a great accomplishment for the company. This figure is now so high that it is close to QuickFlik's total number of subscribers. This latest figure was revealed in the 2017 report, where it also boasted that GreenTech Top Anywhere Video viewing on any device grew more than 50 percent in 2017.

q1.translation: 在2017年的报告中，GreenTech披露了其两项服务的成功，即GreenTech Music和Top Video。现在，绿色科技音乐服务在全球200多个国家提供，拥有4000多万首歌曲的图书馆。目前，绿泰音乐播放列表和Top Stations的使用次数已超过3000亿次。Top Video也经历了有史以来增长最快的一年。全球视频使用量同比增长了一倍多。现在它每月有1亿用户，这对公司来说是一个巨大的成就。

Top Video usage more than doubled year-over-year around the world. It now has 100 million monthly subscribers which is a great accomplishment for the company.

q2.translation: 在2017年的报告中，GreenTech披露了其两项服务的成功，即GreenTech Music和Top Video。现在，绿色科技音乐服务在全球200多个国家提供，拥有4000多万首歌曲的图书馆。目前，绿泰音乐播放列表和Top Stations的使用次数已超过3000亿次。Top Video也经历了有史以来增长最快的一年。全球视频使用量同比增长了一倍多。现在它每月有1亿用户，这对公司来说是一个巨大的成就。这个数字现在是如此之高，接近QuickFlik的用户总数。这一最新数据是在2017年的报告中披露的，该报告还夸耀称，2017年，在任何设备上观看GreenTech Top Anywhere视频的人数增长了50%以上。

options.sentence: That means paying about $119 per year for both GreenTech Music and Top Video, with the option to renew twice.
GreenTech has just been chosen as the world's most valuable company by a long list of investors.
This figure is now so high that it is close to QuickFlik's total number of subscribers.
GreenTech users can use their GreenTech app to access both services.

options.sentence: GreenTech Music is now available in more than 200 countries around the world and has a library of more than 40 million songs.
GreenTech is the first of its kind to offer a streaming video service.
The number of people signing up for GreenTech Music each month is equal to the number of people who cancel.
Top Video began in 2013 and has since released four original series and one miniseries with plans to release more.
